title: Achieving the Impossible, with Steven Kotler
description:
Jillian and Pulitzer Prize nominee Steven Kotler discuss how to unlock the latest findings in neuroscience to align your curiosity, passion, and purpose, achieve the seemingly impossible in our lives, and achieve our loftiest goals. 

Guest Links:

The Art of Impossible: A Peak Performance Primer - www.stevenkotler.com

Free diagnostic: www.FlowBlocker.com

The Flow Research Collective: www.flowresearchcollective.com


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com

Follow us on Instagram @JillianMichaels and @MartiniCindy
